fields.send_reason: A User changed their email address and they now need to reactivate their account with this email sent to their new email address
fields.title: Account Reactivation
fields.content:
Dear {{ display_name }},

 
You have changed your email address on {{ app_name }} at http://{{ site }}
 
Your username is: {{ username }}
 
To reactivate your account, please click <a href="http://{{ site }}/secure/accounts/activate/{{ activation_key }}/">here</a>
 
You have {{ expiration_days }} days to activate your account.
fields.subject: {{ app_name }} Account Reactivation

fields.send_reason: A User registered for an account and they now need to activate it
fields.title: Account Activation
fields.content:
Dear {{ display_name }},

 
You have been registered on {{ app_name }} at http://{{ site }}
 
Your username is: {{ username }}
 
To activate your account, please click <a href="http://{{ site }}/secure/accounts/activate/{{ activation_key }}/">here</a>.
 
You have {{ expiration_days }} days to activate your account.
fields.subject: {{ app_name }} Account Registration

fields.send_reason: An existing Cloud Service provider was uploaded via the console and they now need to reset their password
fields.title: Existing CSP Activation
fields.content:
Dear Cloud Service Provider,

 
We offer an online Cloud Registry that lists a set of cloud services of interest to our customers. Your service is one of the services in our registry. For each service in our registry we gather publicly available information (e.g., if the service allows file sharing, supports encryption, etc.) and compute an objective risk score for the service.  Our customers use this risk score as an important criteria in deciding which service to use.  This information is also available from the web site of the Cloud Security Alliance (see https://cloudsecurityalliance.org/star/registry/).
 
This email is to offer you the opportunity to review the attributes we have on your service and let us know if some attribute value should be changed.
 
Your username is: {{ username }}
 
You can click <a href="http://{{ site }}/secure/accounts/reset/{{ uid }}-{{ token }}/" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; color: #3399cc;">here</a> to reset your password and login to your Skyhigh Networks account and provide us feedback on your attribute values.
 
To find out more about Skyhigh Networks, please see www.skyhighnetworks.com
 
If you are not the correct person to receive this email, please forward this email to the appropriate individual.
fields.plaintext_content:
Dear Cloud Service Provider,

We offer an online Cloud Registry that lists a set of cloud services of interest to our customers. Your service is one of the services in our registry. For each service in our registry we gather publicly available information (e.g., if the service allows file sharing, supports encryption, etc.) and compute an objective risk score for the service.  Our customers use this risk score as an important criteria in deciding which service to use.  This information is also available from the web site of the Cloud Security Alliance (see https://cloudsecurityalliance.org/star/registry/).

This email is to offer you the opportunity to review the attributes we have on your service and let us know if some attribute value should be changed.

Your username is: {{ username }}

You can visit http://{{ site }}/secure/accounts/reset/{{ uid }}-{{ token }}/ to reset your password and login to your Skyhigh Networks account and provide us feedback on your attribute values.

To find out more about Skyhigh Networks, please see www.skyhighnetworks.com

If you are not the correct person to receive this email, please forward this email to the appropriate individual.
fields.subject: Invitation to update your entry in the Skyhigh Networks Cloud Service Registry

fields.send_reason: The User successfully activated their account
fields.title: Successful Account Activation
fields.content:
Dear {{ display_name }},

 
Your account has been successfully activated.
 
Your username is: {{ username }}
 
Please click <a href="http://{{ site }}/secure/accounts/reset/{{ uid }}-{{ token }}/" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; color: #3399cc;">here</a> to reset your password.
fields.plaintext_content:
Dear {{ display_name }},

Your account has been successfully activated.

Your username is: {{ username }}

Please visit http://{{ site }}/secure/accounts/reset/{{ uid }}-{{ token }}/ to reset your password.
fields.subject: {{ app_name }} Account successfully activated

fields.send_reason: A User requested a product evaluation and this email gets sent to internal sales to deal with them directly
fields.title: Internal Product Evaluation Request
fields.content:
User {{ display_name }} has requested a product evaluation with us.<br/>

 
{% if company %}Company: {{ company }}<br/>{% endif %}
 
{% if country %}Country: {{ country }}<br/>{% endif %}
 
{% if state_province %}State / Province: {{ state_province }}<br/>{% endif %}
fields.subject: {{ app_name }} {{ user_email }} requested a Product Evaluation

fields.send_reason: The User updated all their CSP attributes and this email is sent to internal staff notifying them of that
fields.title: Internal CSP Attributes Updated
fields.content:
Cloud Service Provider {{ display_name }} has updated their CSP Attributes,<br/><br/>
 
Please click <a href="http://{{ site }}/console/usage/partner/csp/attribute/list/{{ user_id }}" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; color: #3399cc;">here</a> to edit them<br /><br />
 
They are as follows:<br/>
{% for csp_attribute in csp_attributes %}
    SI Number: {{ csp_attribute.si_number }}<br />
    Category: {{ csp_attribute.category }}<br />
    Name: {{ csp_attribute.name }}<br />
    Value: {{ csp_attribute.value }}<br /><br />
{% endfor %}
fields.subject: {{ app_name }} Cloud Service Provider {{ user_email }} CSP Attributes updated

fields.send_reason: The User uploaded a log file when they requested an evaluation or from their profile page
fields.title: Internal Log File Sample Uploaded
fields.content:
Product Evaluator {{ display_name }} with email address {{ user_email }} has uploaded a logfile,<br/><br />

 
It has been attached.<br /><br />
 
IMPORTANT: do not change any of the formatting of the data, including spaces, commas, tabs, font size, anything!
fields.plaintext_content:
Product Evaluator {{ display_name }} with email address {{ user_email }} has uploaded a logfile,

It has been attached.

IMPORTANT: do not change any of the formatting of the data, including spaces, commas, tabs, font size, anything!
fields.subject: {{ app_name }} Product Evaluator {{ user_email }} uploaded log file!

fields.send_reason: An SFTP account was created for the User and staff must be notified
fields.title: Internal SFTP Account Created
fields.content:
*******
SFTP Account created:
 
User name: {{ username }}
Password : {{ password }}
 
*******
fields.subject: SFTP Account Created for {{ username }}

fields.send_reason: An SFTP User uploaded a file to the SFTP server and staff must be notified
fields.title: Internal SFTP File Uploaded
fields.subject: User uploaded log file
